ANU.name: Dominique Dalla Pozza
interest: Counter-Terrorism Law; Legislative Process; Australian Public Law.
ANU.biography: Dominique is one of the ACT Convenors of the Electoral Regulation Research Network (ERRN).  SHe is a former editor of the Federal Law Review.

publication.title: Refining the Australian Counter-terrorism Legislative Framework: How Deliberative Has Parliament Been?
publication.source: Public Law Review, vol. 27, no. 4, pp. 271-289

publication.title: The Constitutional Protection of Commonwealth Voting Rights: The Case of Rowe v Electoral Commissioner
Promoting Deliberative Debate? The Submissions and Oral Evidence Provided to Australian Parliamentary Committees in the Creation of Counter-Terrorism Laws
publication.source: Australasian Parliamentary Review, vol. 23, no. 1, pp. 39-61

publication.title: The Constitutional Validity Of Declarations Of Incompatibility In Australian Charters Of Rights
publication.source: Deakin Law Review, vol. 12, no. 1, pp. 1-39
